page.title: 12TRADE IN BURSCOUGH
page.content: We looked at the kinds of shops and businesses in Burscough. Most of the shops are grouped together between the railway and canal bridges. There are 54 businesses:4 Banks,1 Postoffice,3 Newsagents,2 Butchers, 2 Greengrocers, 2 Fish and Chip shops, 2 Chemists and 1 Supermarket. Others businesses include clothing, hardware, shoes, electrical goods, off-licence and 2 empty shops. Services available include: Hairdresser, Optician,Solicitor, Insurance Broker and Wedding Car Hire. There are 3 large factories West Brooks (making cardboard boxes) Universal (making tanks for bulk transport) and Ainscoughs (milling corn). Beside these 3 many small businesses exist ,makers of :furniture, agricultural suppliers,wooden tool handles and food processors.
